titles.title: Veteran Small Business Export Promotion Act
Veteran Small Business Export Promotion Act
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to waive the guarantee fee for veterans and spouses of veterans for the Export Working Capital, International Trade, and Export Express programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Veteran Small Business Export Promotion Act
This bill prohibits the Small Business Administration (SBA) from assessing a guarantee fee in connection with a loan made to a veteran or spouse of a veteran under the SBA's Export Working Capital, International Trade, or Export Express programs.
